name: Brain Drain
overview: Think you are smart? Prove it! Brain Drain is the ultimate cerebral challenge. Unscramble the mind-bending puzzles, beat the clock and the odds. Use your power-ups wisely. That’s how you max out your score… and the higher your score, the smarter you are. Sound simple? Plug into Brain Drain and see how smart you are! But be warned... a brain is a terrible thing to drain!
